title: Recent advances in rational structure design for nonlinear optical crystals: leveraging advantageous templates
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS01136D, Review Article
Ziting Yan, Jinbin Fan, Shilie Pan, Min Zhang
An efficient strategy for designing nonlinear optical (NLO) crystals leveraging advantageous templates is proposed, and the recent advancements and prospects have been analyzed, providing valuable insights for the development of NLO materials.
